attrs.name: data
attrs.desc: Set the data of the collapsed menu.

attrs.name: dragable
attrs.desc: Whether to enable the node drag function. The default value is `false`

attrs.name: show-filter
attrs.desc: Specifies whether to display the search box. The default value is `true`.

attrs.name: icon
attrs.desc: Customize the icon on the left of the menu.

attrs.name: default-expand-all
attrs.desc: Whether to expand all nodes in the menu by default. The default value is false.

attrs.name: expand-on-click-node
attrs.desc: Whether to expand or collapse menus by clicking a node. The default value is false.

attrs.name: ellipsis
attrs.desc: Omitted if the menu content is too long. The default value is false.

attrs.name: wrap
attrs.desc: The menu content is displayed in a new line when it is too long. The default value is false.

attrs.name: automatic-filtering
attrs.desc: Whether to automatically filter content when you enter content in the text box. The default value is true.

attrs.name: props
attrs.desc: Configuration data option mapping field name
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is {children: 'children', label: 'label', disabled: 'disabled'}

attrs.name: get-menu-data-sync
attrs.desc: User-defined menu data service. Data is directly returned.

events.name: node-click
node-expand
node-collapse
node-drag-start
events.desc:
Event triggered when a node starts to be dragged. ;Event triggered when a node starts to be dragged. ; / / Parameters:
arg1:Object Data information object of the current node 
arg2:event

events.name: node-drag-enter
events.desc:
This event is triggered when a user drags a node to another node. Event triggered when a user drags a node to another node. / / Parameter 
arg1: Object Data information object of the current node 
arg2: Object Data information object of the current node after the node is dragged.

events.name: node-drag-leave
events.desc:
This event is triggered when a user drags a node. Event triggered when a user drags a node. / / Parameter 
arg1:Object Data information object of the currently dragged node 
arg2: Object Data information object of the currently dragged node

events.name: node-drag-over
events.desc:
Event triggered when a node is dragged (similar to the mouseover event of the browser); Event triggered when a node is dragged (similar to the mouseover event of the browser) / / Parameter 
arg1:Object Data information object of the current dragged node 
arg2:Object Data information object of the current dragged node 
 arg3:event

events.name: node-drag-end
events.desc:
Event triggered when dragging ends (r may not succeed). Event triggered when the drag is successfully completed; / / Parameter 
arg1: Object Data information object of the current node
arg2: Object Data information object of the current node after the node is dragged
arg3: Drag type, for example,'inner'
arg4:event

events.name: node-drop
events.desc:
Indicates the event after a node is dragged and dropped. This parameter is valid when the dragable attribute is set to true. ; Events after a node is dragged and dropped. This parameter is valid when the dragable attribute is set to true. ; / / Parameter 
arg1:Object Data information object of the current dragged node 
 arg2:Object Data information object of the current clicked node after the dragged node 
arg3:Drag type 
arg4:event
